20110119160911.000|20110119160911.000|CC1|  I HAD THIS CHRONIC, DEEP ACHE 
20110119160911.000|20110119160914.000|CC1|           ALL OVER --          
20110119160914.000|20110119160915.000|CC1|     IT WAS A MYSTERY TO ME.    
20110119160915.000|20110119160915.000|CC1|   I FOUND OUT THAT CONNECTED   
20110119160915.000|20110119160917.000|CC1|   TO OUR MUSCLES ARE NERVES    
20110119160917.000|20110119160917.000|CC1|       THAT SEND MESSAGES       
20110119160917.000|20110119160919.000|CC1|       THROUGH THE BODY.        
20110119160919.000|20110119160919.000|CC1|     MY DOCTOR DIAGNOSED IT     
20110119160919.000|20110119160922.000|CC1|        AS FIBROMYALGIA,        
20110119160922.000|20110119160922.000|CC1|    THOUGHT TO BE THE RESULT    
20110119160922.000|20110119160924.000|CC1|      OF OVERACTIVE NERVES      
20110119160924.000|20110119160924.000|CC1|       THAT CAUSE CHRONIC,      
20110119160924.000|20110119160926.000|CC1|        WIDESPREAD PAIN.        
20110119160926.000|20110119160926.000|CC1|   LYRICA IS BELIEVED TO CALM   
20110119160926.000|20110119160928.000|CC1|          THESE NERVES.         
20110119160928.000|20110119160930.000|CC1|  I LEARNED LYRICA CAN PROVIDE  
20110119160930.000|20110119160930.000|CC1|       SIGNIFICANT RELIEF       
20110119160930.000|20110119160933.000|CC1|     FROM FIBROMYALGIA PAIN.    
20110119160933.000|20110119160933.000|CC1|  AND WITH LESS PAIN, I CAN DO  
20110119160933.000|20110119160935.000|CC1|  MORE OF WHAT MATTERS TO ME.   
20110119160935.000|20110119160935.000|CC1|       [ Female Announcer ]     
20110119160935.000|20110119160937.000|CC1|   LYRICA IS NOT FOR EVERYONE.  
20110119160937.000|20110119160937.000|CC1|         LYRICA MAY CAUSE       
20110119160937.000|20110119160940.000|CC1|    SERIOUS ALLERGIC REACTIONS  
20110119160940.000|20110119160940.000|CC1|       OR SUICIDAL THOUGHTS     
20110119160940.000|20110119160942.000|CC1|           OR ACTIONS.          
20110119160942.000|20110119160942.000|CC1|   TELL YOUR DOCTOR RIGHT AWAY  
20110119160942.000|20110119160943.000|CC1|        IF YOU HAVE THESE,      
20110119160943.000|20110119160945.000|CC1|   NEW OR WORSENING DEPRESSION, 
20110119160945.000|20110119160945.000|CC1|       OR UNUSUAL CHANGES       
20110119160945.000|20110119160947.000|CC1|       IN MOOD OR BEHAVIOR      
20110119160947.000|20110119160947.000|CC1|         OR ANY SWELLING        
20110119160947.000|20110119160950.000|CC1| OR AFFECTED BREATHING, OR SKIN,
20110119160950.000|20110119160950.000|CC1|     OR CHANGES IN EYESIGHT,    
20110119160950.000|20110119160952.000|CC1|     INCLUDING BLURRY VISION    
20110119160952.000|20110119160952.000|CC1|          OR MUSCLE PAIN        
20110119160952.000|20110119160954.000|CC1|   WITH FEVER OR TIRED FEELING. 
20110119160954.000|20110119160954.000|CC1|       COMMON SIDE EFFECTS      
20110119160954.000|20110119160957.000|CC1|    ARE DIZZINESS, SLEEPINESS,  
20110119160957.000|20110119160957.000|CC1|     WEIGHT GAIN AND SWELLING   
20110119160957.000|20110119161000.000|CC1|     OF HANDS, LEGS AND FEET.   
20110119161000.000|20110119161000.000|CC1|       DON'T DRINK ALCOHOL      
20110119161000.000|20110119161001.000|CC1|       WHILE TAKING LYRICA.
